item.title: Mud - Lonely This Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
Lonely This Christmas - by Mud
This is a nice, easy slow song making it ideal for beginners.
Using the chords: C Am F G (you can play G7 if needed)
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
